column3: you can send in the categories you would like to see in the awards. Next sunday/monday we will post the ones most requested and set up the polls so everyone can vote! column2: the annual pop culture convention that sees more than 160
column3: 000 attendees descend on the San Diego Convention Center every year. To prepare you for the 2016 show
